a.n: Red Light: Lea Lexis & Derrick Pierce

p.k: Red Light is like a waking dream set in the streets of Los Angeles. It's the story of a woman's transformation into her true self, and a wild chase by her friends to find the woman that they think they've lost. We watch as all of her friends join the hunt, and one by one find themselves in their own little dreams... A Wicked film.
